question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.-explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months- say how your work could be done while you are away- ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this missive to let you know that my employee id is 123 and I am working as a Marketing and Sales employee for around 4 years.However,as per the company , a policy I find myself suitable for the head office branch which is located internationally,as besides my work experience I have earned several certificates of the best employee during my tenure.As a result,I want to spend 6 months in the company's Japan branch in spite of getting promoted to the same locality.
I wanted to be a part of the head office branch because I will get more exposure which will be beneficial in the later stage when I will rejoin the branch.

I will manage my duties and responsibilities of the home branch while I am in a foreign branch by working from the location in the evening.Apart from this,my co-worker Sachin who is a junior Marketing manager will address all the issues allocated to my position.
To initiate the process,it is essential that as a manager you must approve my request.As well as,it would be great if you will arrange the accommodation and taxi facility on the company's behalf.
I hope to hear from you soon
